starvationevasion.client.net

Class AbstractClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • starvationevasion.client.net.AbstractClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComputerClient, HumanClient

    public abstract class AbstractClient
extends java.lang.Thread
    A client that will communicate with server. Responsible for holding relevant attributes communication tasks that apply to both Human and Computer.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  AbstractClient.ClientListener
      The ClientListener is used to respond to server messages received through the ObjectInputStream, as well as print useful information to the console.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractClient

        public AbstractClient(GameOptions options,
                      Player player,
                      GameStateData gameState)
        Creates a new generic client (for either a human or AI connection to the server) with the given options, state, and a controller. GameOptions are used for the player's login credentials, as well as the information we'll need to connect to the server. GameStateData allows the client to respond to changes in ServerState. The AbstractPlayerController allows us to get/set player state information based on messages from the server.
        Parameters:
        options - GameOptions to reference for server location/login credentials.
        player - The AbstractPlayerController we'll use to control the player in response to server messages.
        gameState - The GameState to modify/respond to as a result of server messages.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect()

      • requestRegion

        public void requestRegion(java.lang.String region)
        Requests the passed region, in String form, from the server. Does not guarantee that the region will be assigned.
        Parameters:
        region - the region to request, in String form.

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Returns whether or not the client is currently connected to the server.
        Returns:
        true if connected.

      • setIsConnected

        public void setIsConnected(boolean isConnected)
        Changes connection status based on the passed boolean value.
        Parameters:
        isConnected - true if connected.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnects the client from the server. Closes both reader and writer and sets the player that is with the client to disconnected. We also send the server a Goodbye message.

      • login

        public void login()
        Logs the client into the server, using the client's currently assigned username, pass, and login nonce. These credentials are set in GameOptions and retrieved here at login.

      • send

        public void send(java.io.Serializable message)
        Sends a message to the server. See starvationevasion.common.messages for allowable Serializable messages
        Parameters:
        message - a Serializable message object

      • openConnection

        private boolean openConnection(java.lang.String host,
                               int portNumber)
